actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of certain former members of the Army who participated in the Dengue Fever Experiments in the Philippine Islands.

summary.text: Provides for the payment of $150 per month for life to specified former members of the Army who participated in the dengue fever experiments in the Phillipine Islands. Provides that unremarried widows of such Army members may receive 55 percent of the benefits which their husbands would have received. Requires application for such benefits.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of certain former members of the Army who participated in the Dengue Fever Experiments in the Philippine Islands.
